iati-activity.title: On Grid Small Scale Renewable Energy in Uganda
iati-activity.description: To improve the environment for private investment in Uganda’s renewable energy sector by supporting the construction of at least 15 on-grid small scale power plants. This will increase Uganda’s energy production by circa 20%, mobilise up to £240 million in private finance and stabilise Uganda’s power sector finances by saving approximately $260m to 2.7bn during the period 2013-35, and lead to greenhouse gas emission savings of between 1 and 10 MtCO2e.
